# Ganache GitHub Action

This [GitHub Action](https://github.com/features/actions) sets up a Truffle ganache server into a docker container.

# Usage

See [action.yml](action.yml)

Basic:
```yaml
steps:
- uses: tchambard/truffle-ganache-action@v1
```
